item.title: BÃ i 16 - Äá»‡ Quy Trong JavaScript - Recursion
item.author: nguyenwoong20@gmail.com (Nguyen)
item.description:
ğŸ¥ Video hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n chi tiáº¿t

1. Äá»‡ quy lÃ  gÃ¬? 

// Äá»‡ quy: function gá»i chÃ­nh nÃ³
// Cáº§n 2 thÃ nh pháº§n: Base case + Recursive case

function factorial(n) {
    // Base case - Ä‘iá»u kiá»‡n dá»«ng
    if (n <= 1) {
        return 1;
    }
    
    // Recursive case - gá»i láº¡i chÃ­nh nÃ³
    return n * factorial(n - 1);
}

console.log(factorial(5)); // 120
// 5! = 5 Ã— 4 Ã— 3 Ã— 2 Ã— 1 = 120

2. VÃ­ dá»¥ phá»• biáº¿n 

// Fibonacci sequence
function fibonacci(n) {
    if (n <= 1) return n;
    return fibonacci(n - 1) + fibonacci(n - 2);
}
console.log(fibonacci(6)); // 8

// TÃ¬m kiáº¿m nhá»‹ phÃ¢n
function binarySearch(arr, target, left = 0, right = arr.length - 1) {
    if (left > right) return -1;
    
    let mid = Math.floor((left + right) / 2);
    
    if (arr[mid] === target) return mid;
    
    if (arr[mid] > target) {
        return binarySearch(arr, target, left, mid - 1);
    } else {
        return binarySearch(arr, target, mid + 1, right);
    }
}

let numbers = [1, 3, 5, 7, 9];
console.log(binarySearch(numbers, 7)); // 3

3. Xá»­ lÃ½ cáº¥u trÃºc lá»“ng nhau 

// TÃ­nh tá»•ng máº£ng Ä‘a chiá»u
function sumNestedArray(arr) {
    let sum = 0;
    for (let item of arr) {
        if (Array.isArray(item)) {
            sum += sumNestedArray(item); // Recursive
        } else {
            sum += item; // Base case
        }
    }
    return sum;
}

let nested = [1, [2, 3], [4, [5, 6]], 7];
console.log(sumNestedArray(nested)); // 28

// Flatten máº£ng
function flattenArray(arr) {
    let result = [];
    for (let item of arr) {
        if (Array.isArray(item)) {
            result = result.concat(flattenArray(item));
        } else {
            result.push(item);
        }
    }
    return result;
}

console.log(flattenArray(nested)); // [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]

4. LÆ°u Ã½ quan trá»ng 

// âš ï¸ TrÃ¡nh Stack Overflow - luÃ´n cÃ³ base case
function infiniteRecursion(n) {
    return infiniteRecursion(n); // NGUY HIá»‚M!
}

// âœ… So sÃ¡nh vá»›i vÃ²ng láº·p
// Äá»‡ quy - code ngáº¯n gá»n nhÆ°ng cháº­m hÆ¡n
function factorialRecursive(n) {
    if (n <= 1) return 1;
    return n * factorialRecursive(n - 1);
}

// VÃ²ng láº·p - nhanh hÆ¡n, Ã­t memory hÆ¡n
function factorialIterative(n) {
    let result = 1;
    for (let i = 2; i <= n; i++) {
        result *= i;
    }
    return result;
}

Chá»‘t láº¡i

  1. Äá»‡ quy: Function gá»i chÃ­nh nÃ³, cáº§n base case vÃ  recursive case
  2. Base case: Äiá»u kiá»‡n dá»«ng Ä‘á»ƒ trÃ¡nh vÃ²ng láº·p vÃ´ táº­n
  3. Æ¯u Ä‘iá»ƒm: Code ngáº¯n gá»n, phÃ¹ há»£p vá»›i cáº¥u trÃºc lá»“ng nhau
  4. NhÆ°á»£c Ä‘iá»ƒm: Cháº­m hÆ¡n vÃ²ng láº·p, tiÃªu tá»‘n memory, nguy cÆ¡ Stack Overflow
  5. Khi dÃ¹ng: Cáº¥u trÃºc Ä‘á»‡ quy (tree, nested array), bÃ i toÃ¡n chia Ä‘á»ƒ trá»‹

ğŸ‰ ChÃºc má»«ng!

Báº¡n Ä‘Ã£ hoÃ n thÃ nh 16 bÃ i cá»§a series JavaScript CÆ¡ Báº£n!
